name: The Arrow Cushion PDF Pattern
description:
Original cross stitch pattern for the "Arrow Cushion".

Once checkout and payment is complete a link will be emailed to you to enable you to download the pattern in PDF form. You can then print and create your own embroidery from this design.

Full technical details (number of stitches, pattern size, materials, etc.) and a cushion-making tutorial are included with the chart so that you can make your own complete project from this pattern.

You can see examples of the finished design in the photos. You could also frame your work and display it on the wall if you prefer.

Please note this pattern is for personal use only - not for commercial use or resale.

This listing is for a PDF of the pattern only, the additional photographs are solely for illustration of the finished design.

Please be sure to read our terms of use before purchasing.

name: Winter Fair Isle Cross Stitch Cushion Kit
description: Printed with individual crosses ready to stitch over, this large cushion kit is perfect for beginners, people with poor eyesight, those who prefer not to count their stitches, and awesome folks who just appreciate good design. At around 12 hours stitching time it is also significantly quicker to complete than the average embroidered cushion. It is entirely washable* so you needn't be afraid to use it when it's finished, and it travels well too - the perfect project to pop into your bag for a cheeky little holiday stitching session, should you be so inclined. The kit is a doddle to put together and makes a large (16"/41cm) square cushion cover with an envelope back - no backing fabric, zip or sewing machine needed. The fabric is pre-hemmed so you don't need to worry about fraying edges or cutting it to size. If you can measure, fold and sew two straight lines then you're good to go! The kit comes in four different colourways: Duck Egg/Golden Olive, Pine/Spruce and Sugarplum/Cocoa each contain three complementary shades of thread (enough of each shade to allocate them as you wish); and Holly Berry is stitched entirely in a single colour. Please choose the colour you would like from the drop-down menu. Each kit includes: Thick cotton canvas printed panel; Embroidery threads; 2 x needles; Colour chart (showing how the colours are split); and Full instructions for stitching and making up. You will need your own sharp scissors, embroidery hoop (any size), pins, a little cream sewing thread and a cushion pad. Kits are not suitable for children. The additional photographs are illustrations of the finished design - please note this listing is for the kit only. Please click here for information on delivery costs. *Care Instructions: hand wash, dry flat, iron with stitches face down over a terry towel.

name: Mini Folk Letter PDF Patterns
description: Original cross stitch patterns for the "Mini Folk Letter" designs. The letters are designed to fit neatly into a 5" wooden hoop when stitched onto 27/28-count linen or 14-count aida, and each take just a few hours to stitch so are perfect for beginners or for turning into making last minute presents. Individual patterns sold separately - please choose which letter(s) you would like from the drop down menu. Once checkout and payment is complete a link will be emailed to you to enable you to download the pattern in PDF form. You can then print and create your own embroidery from the design. Pattern information (number of stitches, pattern size, amount of thread needed, etc.) is included, along with a tutorial to frame your embroidery in its hoop should you so wish. If you are new to cross stitch, free guides are available to download here. Please note these patterns are for personal use only - not for commercial use or resale. This listing is for a PDF of the individual pattern only, additional photographs are solely for illustration of the finished design(s). All letters are available - please see the final picture for examples of these. Please be sure to read the terms of use before purchasing.

name: Fantabulous Mr Fox Pincushion Supply Kit + Book
description:
My new book! And with this bundle you also get an exclusive supply kit for one of my favourite projects: the Fantabulous Mr Fox Pincushion.

I have taken all the hard work out of tracking down the right supplies by putting together a pack of the exact materials I used for this project in the book. It comes with evenweave fabric, embroidery threads, backing fabric and needles. You will need your own hoop, cushion stuffing and a sewing machine or needle and thread for making up.

The book itself is a collection of projects and stories set in a wild sort of a fairyland. There are patterns big and small; things for beginners and seasoned stitchers alike, and another little miniature kit in the back. Expect foxes and stags, a big bad wolf, unicorns and jackalopes and frog princes, oh my!

I haven't scribbled on any of them yet, but if you would like me to sign your copy, just leave a message in the comments box at the checkout with a note of anything specific you would like it to say and I shall be happy to oblige.

name: Fantabulous Mr Fox Pincushion Supply Kit
description:
This is a supply kit for one of my favourite projects from Storyland Cross Stitch: the Fantabulous Mr Fox Pincushion.

I have taken all the hard work out of tracking down the right supplies by putting together a pack of the exact materials I used for this project in the book. It comes with evenweave fabric, embroidery threads, backing fabric and needles. You will need your own hoop, cushion stuffing and a sewing machine or needle and thread for making up.

Please note that this supply kit doesn't contain the pattern or instructions - these are available exclusively in the book.

If you want a copy of the book too, you can save money on this supply kit by getting both it and the book together as a bundle also available in the shop - this listing is really just in case you already have a copy of the book or if want to order materials for more than one project.

name: Storyland Cross Stitch
description:
My new book! 

It is a collection of projects and stories set in a wild sort of a fairyland. There are patterns big and small; things for beginners and seasoned stitchers alike, and a lovely little miniature kit in the back so that you can start stitching something right away. Expect foxes and stags, a big bad wolf, unicorns and jackalopes and frog princes, oh my!

You can see a preview of some of the projects in the additional photos.

I haven't scribbled on any of them yet, but if you would like me to sign your copy, just leave a message in the comments box at the checkout with a note of anything specific you would like it to say and I shall be happy to oblige.

name: Spectacular Stags Cross Stitch Cushion Kit
description: Printed with individual crosses ready to stitch over, this large cushion kit is perfect for beginners, people with poor eyesight, those who prefer not to count their stitches, and awesome folks who just appreciate good design. At around 15 hours stitching time it is also significantly quicker to complete than the average embroidered cushion. It is entirely washable* so you needn't be afraid to use it when it's finished, and it travels well too - the perfect project to pop into your bag for a cheeky little holiday stitching session, should you be so inclined. The kit is a doddle to put together and makes a large (16"/41cm) square cushion cover with an envelope back - no backing fabric, zip or sewing machine needed. The fabric is pre-hemmed so you don't need to worry about fraying edges or cutting it to size. If you can measure, fold and sew two straight lines then you're good to go! The kit comes in four different colourways: Golden Olive, Dusty Plum and Emerald Green each contain two complementary shades of thread (enough of each shade to allocate them as you wish); and Jet Black is stitched entirely in a single colour. Please choose the colour you would like from the drop-down menu. Each kit includes: Thick cotton canvas printed panel; Embroidery threads; 2 x needles; Colour chart (showing how the colours are split); and Full instructions for stitching and making up. You will need your own sharp scissors, embroidery hoop (any size), pins, a little cream sewing thread and a cushion pad. Kits are not suitable for children. The additional photographs are illustrations of the finished design - please note this listing is for the kit only. Please click here for information on delivery costs. *Care Instructions: hand wash, dry flat, iron with stitches face down over a terry towel.

name: Navajo Wolf Bag Kit
description: Heavy canvas bag printed with large original cross stitch pattern ready to stitch over - perfect for beginners, people with poor eyesight, those who prefer not to count their stitches, and awesome folks who just appreciate good design. The bag is large and sturdy, measuring 38cm x 43cm with a full 10cm gusset and long webbed cotton shoulder straps. Use it for your shopping, overnight stays, your craft stash, laundry, hiding paperwork, etc. The kit includes all the materials you need to complete the project: Printed canvas bag; Embroidery threads (choose colours from drop-down menu); 2 x needles; and Instructions. You will need your own sharp scissors but you don't need a hoop because the fabric is nice and thick so remains fairly rigid as you stitch. The additional photographs are illustrations of the finished design - please note this listing is for the kit only. Kits are not suitable for children. Recommended spot clean or gentle hand wash only. Please click here for information on delivery costs.

name: Anatomical Heart PDF Pattern

name: Gigantic Circus Letter PDF Patterns
description: Original cross stitch patterns for the "Gigantic Circus Letter" designs. Individual patterns sold separately - please choose which letter(s) you would like from the drop down menu. ***Be warned - these designs are HUGE (14 inches high on 14-count aida/28-count linen) and each pattern is spread over a number of sheets so only attempt them if you have serious staying power!*** Once checkout and payment is complete a link will be emailed to you to enable you to download the pattern in PDF form. You can then print and create your own embroidery from the design. Pattern information (number of stitches, pattern size, amount of thread needed) is included on the pattern sheet. name: Custom Orders
description: If you have arranged a custom order with me you can make payment using this page. The default amount of this item is 1, so you will need to change the quantity to the price I have quoted you in order to pay the correct amount. For example, if your custom order is quoted at 25, please alter the number in the "Quantity" box to 25. Please leave a note in the "message to seller" area when you checkout to let me know what the payment is for and any other information you may wish to add, e.g. alternative address details, etc. No additional charges will be added to this payment, so please be sure to include any postal charges quoted in the total amount you pay. **This is not an area to place custom orders, simply a way to pay for existing orders. If you would like to discuss placing a custom order please contact me.** Thank you kindly!

name: UK Next Day Delivery Upgrade
description: Standard delivery on all UK orders is by Royal Mail First Class post, which aims to deliver within 1-3 working days of despatch. If you need your kits faster, please add this Special Delivery upgrade to your shopping cart. For orders placed before 12pm, this guarantees delivery by 1pm on the next working day (orders posted on a Friday will be delivered on the following Monday). The delivery will need to be signed for. Please note the cost of this upgrade is in addition to the standard delivery charge applied automatically when you check out. This service is not available of I am on holiday or working away (if this is the case I will post clear notices on the home and checkout pages of my shop). For more information on UK and international delivery please click here.

name: Winter Fair Isle Printed Cushion Kit
